summary: This is an email forwarded to Judge Mimi Tsankov on August 11, 2020, containing a disclosure from an individual identifying as a victim of the Epstein/Maxwell scandal. The writer reports being exploited, including being flown somewhere after a wrongful termination and potentially videotaped in an Airbnb connected to individuals linked to the New York Academy of Art, which received funding from Epstein and Maxwell. The writer expresses concern for the judge's safety.

persons.name: Mimi Tsankov
persons.context: The recipient of the forwarded email disclosure. The writer expresses concern for her safety and health.

persons.name: Gary Faigan
persons.role: Founder of Gage Academy of Art, former professor
persons.context: Founded the Gage Academy of Art in Seattle. He and his wife arrived from New Mexico after he was a professor at the New York Academy of Art, which received financial contributions from Epstein and Maxwell.

persons.name: Pamela Belyea
persons.context: Arrived with her husband Gary Faigan by way of New Mexico.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as a huge financial contributor to the New York Academy of Art. Central figure in the scandal referenced by the writer.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as a huge financial contributor to the New York Academy of Art. Central figure in the scandal referenced by the writer.

connections.description: Referred to together as huge financial contributors to the New York Academy of Art and central figures in the scandal.
Epstein is described as a huge financial contributor to the New York Academy of Art.
Maxwell is described as a huge financial contributor to the New York Academy of Art.
Gary Faigan was a professor at the New York Academy of Art.
Gary Faigan and Pamela Belyea are described as husband and wife who arrived together from New Mexico.

events.title: Victim Disclosure to State Police
events.description: The writer reports being a victim of the Epstein/Maxwell scandal to the State Police, anticipating the evidence will be reported to the FBI.

events.title: Writer Watches Netflix Documentary
events.description: The writer watched a Netflix documentary about Epstein/Maxwell the evening before their disclosure, which spurred their action.

events.title: Writer's Wrongful Termination and Flight
events.description: The writer mentions being flown to an unspecified location upon a wrongful termination in February 2019, which they connect to their exploitation.

keyFacts: An individual identifies as a victim of the Epstein/Maxwell scandal, reporting exploitation including being flown somewhere after a wrongful termination in February 2019.
The victim believes they were unlawfully videotaped having sex in an Airbnb connected to Gary Faigan, founder of the Gage Academy of Art in Seattle.
Gary Faigan and his wife Pamela Belyea have a connection to the New York Academy of Art, where Faigan was a professor and which received huge financial contributions from Epstein and Maxwell.
The disclosure was prompted by the writer watching a Netflix documentary about Epstein/Maxwell and was made to State Police with the expectation it would be forwarded to the FBI.
The writer expresses concern for the safety and health of Judge Mimi Tsankov, suggesting potential targeting of legal professionals.
